name: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke!
name_original: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke!
description:
Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke

Touhou Project  vertical side-scroller fangame 

Created for Touhou Fan Game Jam 7

Kaguya has been captured by the Lunarians. Will Mokou be able to reach the Moon and rescue the Princess?

Control Mokou's hot air balloon with the keyboard, and try to evade obstacles on your way to the Moon!

Escape to pause the game, alt+F4 to quit the game

Some mechanics are unfinished

You can listen to the soundtrack here:

https://soundcloud.com/user-740100457/sets/reach-for-the-moon-immortal

Credits:

MagpieTeahouse:

barukowo - Art, Music Arrangement

Capellan - Programming, Gameplay

All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, music, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanwork, and is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.
